title: Part One: The Nazi Pedophile Cult Leader who Murdered Santa (With Paul F. Tompkins)
itunes:title: Part One: The Nazi Pedophile Cult Leader who Murdered Santa (With Paul F. Tompkins)
description:
Robert is joined by Paul F. Tompkins to discuss Nazi Cult Leader, Paul Schäfer.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. https://www.independent.co.uk/news/obituaries/paul-schafer-nazi-colonel-who-established-anti-semitic-colony-chile-after-war-1981014.html
  2. https://www.dw.com/en/ex-nazi-tyrannical-cult-leader-dies-in-chile/a-5503076
  3. https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/morning-mix/wp/2017/07/14/chilean-victims-of-ex-nazis-cult-of-horrors-may-finally-get-some-answers/
  4. https://www.dw.com/en/chile-germany-establish-colonia-dignidad-commission/a-39682775
  5. https://theamericanscholar.org/the-torture-colony/#
  6. https://www.washingtonpost.com/archive/politics/1980/02/11/colonia-dignidad-nobody-comes-nobody-goes-mystery-veils-colony-in-chile/6fbfe01c-9cc2-424e-a225-daf41296cb92/?utm_term=.f630845c431d&itid=lk_inline_manual_30
  7. https://www.bbc.com/news/world-latin-america-48318295
  8. https://www.ecchr.eu/en/case/colonia-dignidad-remains-a-dark-chapter-of-german-legal-history/
  9. https://www.nytimes.com/2005/06/17/world/americas/at-cults-enclave-in-chile-guns-and-intelligence-files.html
  10. https://www.theguardian.com/world/2015/oct/19/chile-former-spy-germans-sentenced-kidnappings-colonia-dignidad
  11. https://www.thedailybeast.com/inside-a-nazi-pedophiles-horrifying-chilean-child-rape-cult
  12. https://www.nytimes.com/2002/05/19/world/hints-of-cruel-fate-for-american-lost-in-chile.html
  13. https://www.reuters.com/article/us-germany-chile-sect/insight-german-sect-victims-seek-escape-from-chilean-nightmare-past-idUSBRE8480MN20120509
  14. https://jonestown.sdsu.edu/?page_id=67352
